short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Medidata Companion Browser Extension is a browser extension that operates in conjunction with the Medidata Companion product suite

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a supporting component of the Medidata Companion tool in distro environment.  It is a requirement that users install it for the tool to be fully functional
